biotools.summary: FASTQuick is an ultra-fast QC tool for NGS sequencing fastq files. It generates a comprehensive list of QC statistics, including ancestry and contamination estimation, at ~50x faster turnaround time than alignment-based QC tools.

bioschemas.name: FASTQuick
bioschemas.summary: FASTQuick is an ultra-fast QC tool for NGS sequencing fastq files. It generates a comprehensive list of QC statistics, including ancestry and contamination estimation, at ~50x faster turnaround time than alignment-based QC tools.
